name: tm18
effect: Teaches Rain Dance to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Rain Dance to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Counter)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Raises the power of
WATER-type moves
for 5 turns.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Raises the power of
WATER-type moves
for 5 turns.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A heavy rain falls
for five turns,
powering up WATER-
type moves.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user summons a heavy rain that
falls for five turns, powering up
Water-type moves.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five
turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers
the power of Fire-type moves.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five
turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers
the power of Fire-type moves.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
After making its attack, the user rushes back to
switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage
from physical attacks for five turns.
